title: Inquiry Orchestration Skill for Multi-Agent Deliberation
description: Create a /inquiry <ID> skill that launches and manages inquiry investigations. Reads inquiry_report.json and QUESTION.md from any project's feature-management/inquiries/ directory, spawns N research agents using ccmux MCP tools, tags sessions appropriately, integrates with watchdog for monitoring, and handles phase transitions through the full INQ lifecycle (research -> synthesis -> debate -> consensus).
user_impact: Enables automated multi-agent deliberation for complex decisions across any featmgmt-enabled project, reducing manual coordination overhead and ensuring structured consensus-building
